subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Daniel Alfredsson and Antoine Vermette scored on Ottawa’s first two chances in a shootout last night and Martin Gerber stopped Boston’s initial pair of shooters to lift the visiting Senators to a 2-1 victory, their 12th in their first 13 games.
snippet: Daniel Alfredsson and Antoine Vermette scored on Ottawa’s first two chances in a shootout last night and Martin Gerber stopped Boston’s initial pair of shooters to lift the visiting Senators to a 2-1 victory, their 12th in their first 13 games.
